author: kandrosov
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds L1TauTriggerFilterObjectProducer that produces a collection of L1 taus of type trigger::TriggerFilterObjectWithRefs. This collection can later be used as an input to L2TauTagNNProducer.

This PR is a backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47680 into 15_0_X
title: [15_0_X] Adding L1TauTriggerFilterObjectProducer (backport)
